item.title: How to create Word file from asciidoc
item.description: The easiest way to create Microsoft Word files (.docx) from asciidoc, is to generate the .html using asciidoctor and then using pandoc to convert that .html to .docx. In the code below, we avoid having to install pandoc by running it from a docker container. asciidoctor my_file.adoc docker run --rm --volume "`pwd`:/data" pandoc/core my_file.html -o my_file.docx These can be combined in a Makefile, like so: my_file.html: my_file.adoc asciidoctor index.adoc my_file.
